name: Carl's Car
description:
While driving on a strange road to hopefully go home, Carl doesn't notice that this seemingly infinite "shortcut" will lead to his doom.

Help him delaying his unavoidable "death" by changing where the obstacles will appear.

Oh, and don't worry about Carl, if his Car happen to explode, he will just pop back up at the road when you click restart in the game over screen.

Poor Carl,having to drive in this infinite hell for all eternity...

This is actually my first ever finished game where everyting was done by me,and any kind of criticism is accepted with pleasure,so feel free to point out in the comments my bad good game design ideas, awful incredible spritework, ear bleeding beautiful music and bugs that I didn't notice appeared magically.

I highly recommend checking the intructions menu to not get stuck after like, 10 seconds of playing?

Anyways play nice.
